title: LSGD Kerala Jobs 2026 - Apply Online for 03 Planner Consultant Posts
description: The Local Self Government Department, Kerala (LSGD Kerala) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Planner Consultant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation can apply for the LSGD Kerala Jobs 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, ...
